group.title: Fancy RecyclerView 2 - Group
group.description: Based on the Android RecyclerView widget. This extension adds many functionalities of the RecyclerView for Kodular.

extensions.name: Fancy RecyclerView 2
extensions.description: Based on the Android RecyclerView widget. This extension adds many functionalities of the RecyclerView for Kodular.

events.name: OnWidgetClicked
events.description: Event generated when any widget is clicked.For this event to be fired by a widget, it must have the respective property,"Clickable".

events.name: OnWidgetLongClicked
events.description: Event generated when any widget is long clicked.For this event to be fired by a widget, it must have the respective property,"Clickable".

events.name: OnBindingRequest
events.description: Event launched when a group changes its position and needs to update its widgets.

events.name: OnBindingCustomView
events.description: Event fired when the custom widget that is optionally configured in the RecyclerView is visible on the screen or needs to be updated.

events.name: FastScrolled
events.description: Event launched when the "Listenable Scroll" method finished and the group being navigated to is already visible on the screen.

events.name: ItemSwiped
events.description: Event launched when a group triggers a swipe action.Indicates whether the action corresponds to the right or left side.

events.name: MultiSelectionOptionSelected
events.description: Event triggered when an option is selected in multiple selection mode.

methods.name: AddSelectionIconOption
methods.description:
Adds options with icons to the multi-selection bar.
**Info:**
>These options will be added to the selection bar.
>The icon is the name of a file in assets or the path to an image file.

methods.name: AddSelectionOption
methods.description:
Adds options to the multi-selection bar.
**Info:**
>An option to select all items can be set with the SelectAllTitle property.

methods.name: Build
methods.description:
Finishes with the recyclerview configuration and adds it inside the specified component.
**Info:**
>It is preferable not to add it inside a Scroll Arrangement, but it can be added inside a Swipe Refresh Layout or other arrangement.

methods.name: GetCurrentScrollPixels
methods.description: Returns the offset position the recyclerview is currently in, the value is returned in pixels.

methods.name: GetGroupForPosition
methods.description:
Returns the group corresponding to an adapter position (linked to the number of items in the data list). It will only return a valid position if the corresponding group is visible on the screen.
**Info:**
>It should be used when we are sure that the item corresponding to the position is visible on the screen, for example after using the ListenableScroll method.

methods.name: GetLastSyncedWidget
methods.description:
Returns the last widget synced with the RecyclerView.
**Info:**
>The returned widget cannot be edited with the Kodular blocks, but it does allow it to be used with extensions such as the Widget Animator or widget Screenshot.

methods.name: GetRootName
methods.description:
Returns a name that is used to identify the first widget to be added to the RecyclerView model.
**Info:**
>This block tells the RecyclerView that it is starting to create the model.

methods.name: GetScrollRangePixels
methods.description: Returns the maximum scroll position of the RecyclerView. It is returned in pixels.

methods.name: ListenableScrollTo
methods.description: Causes the RecyclerView to go to a certain position and calls the FastScroll event when it is done scrolling.

methods.name: NotifyDataSetChanged
methods.description: Notifies the recyclerview that a change occurred in the data list, because of this, it will have to update the widgets.

methods.name: ScrollTo
methods.description: Causes the RecyclerView to scroll to the specified position. It does not notify when it is done.

methods.name: SetCustomView
methods.description: Sets the component that will be displayed among the RecyclerView items.

methods.name: SetGridManager
methods.description: Sets the layout manager to Grid, so that the items in the RecyclerView will be displayed with columns or rows, depending on the orientation.

methods.name: SetListManager
methods.description: Sets the layout manager to List, so the items in the RecyclerView will be listed horizontally or vertically depending on the orientation.

methods.name: SetScrollListener
methods.description:
It establishes the procedure that is responsible for listening to the changes of state when scrolling in the RecyclerView.
**Info:**
>The addresses are automatically detected depending on the layout manager.
>In a horizontal manager the procedure should have the following parameters: [canScrollToLeft, canScrollToRight, isIddle]
>In a vertical manager they should be: [canScrollToTop, canScrollToBottom, isIddle]
>The isIddle parameter refers to whether the RecyclerView is idle.

methods.name: SetStaggeredGridManager
methods.description: Sets the layout manager as a staggered grid. It will be displayed in columns or rows depending on the orientation.

methods.name: SetSwipeForViewTypes
methods.description:
It establishes in which direction or in which directions each type of view can be scrolled.
**Info:**
>The letters l, r, and b are used to indicate the left, right, and both sides respectively.
>Rules structure:
[view-type]:[side]
Example:"4: l, 5: r, 6: b"

methods.name: SetViewTypeProvider
methods.description:
It establishes the procedure that is in charge of returning the type of view according to the position that the RecyclerView returns.
**Info:**
>The procedure must have the parameters [position, listItem]
>It must return a type of view, it must be one created previously.

methods.name: SmoothScrollTo
methods.description:
Causes the RecyclerView to scroll smoothly to a specific position.
**Info:**
>It does not notify any event if it finished with its task.

methods.name: Sync
methods.description: It is mainly used when configuring the RecyclerView for the first time, it tells all the components that depend on it that this RecyclerView is currently being worked on.

methods.name: SyncWidget
methods.description: Synchronizes a widget with the RecyclerView. It is mainly used to edit the widgets.

methods.name: SyncWithViewType
methods.description: Synchronizes the RecyclerView and also introduce a new type of view in it.

methods.name: UpdateData
methods.description: Changes the data list bound to the RecyclerView, notifies you that it should be redrawn according to the new list.

methods.name: UpdateVisibleItem
methods.description: Notifies the RecyclerView that it has to redraw an item regardless of whether the linked list underwent a change.

properties.name: DividerColor
properties.description:
Sets the color of the division between the groups.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Designer, Blocks*

properties.name: DividerSize
properties.description:
Sets the height/width of the division between the groups.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Designer, Blocks*

properties.name: CustomView
properties.description:
Sets whether the RecyclerView will show a component among its groups.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Designer, Blocks*

properties.name: CustomViewItemsOffset
properties.description:
Sets the number of items to be displayed before displaying the set component.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Designer, Blocks*

properties.name: MultiSelection
properties.description:
Sets whether multi-selection is enabled.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Designer, Blocks*

properties.name: MultiSelectionSuffix
properties.description:
Sets the text that will be displayed after the number of items selected in the selection bar.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Designer, Blocks*

properties.name: SelectAllTitle
properties.description:
Sets the title of the option button to make a selection of all items.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Designer, Blocks*

properties.name: MultiSelectionOpacity
properties.description:
Sets the opacity of the group when it is selected.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Designer, Blocks*
**Info:**
>Values range from 0.0 to 1.0

properties.name: MultiSelectionColor
properties.description:
Sets the background color of the group when selected.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Designer, Blocks*

properties.name: SwipeActions
properties.description:
Specifies whether swipe actions will be available to the RecyclerView.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Designer, Blocks*

properties.name: SwipeDirection
properties.description:
Specify the available sides to trigger swipe actions. "Left, Right and Both".
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Designer*
**Info:**
>Sides can be specified for each view type with the "SetSwipeForViewTypes" method.

properties.name: SwipeThreshold
properties.description:
The fraction that the user should move the group to be considered as swiped.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Designer, Blocks*
**Info:**
>Values range from 0.0 to 1.0
>The fraction is calculated with respect to RecyclerView's bounds.

properties.name: SwipeVelocityThreshold
properties.description:
Defines the maximum velocity ItemTouchHelper will ever calculate for pointer movements.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Designer, Blocks*
**Info:**
>Values range from 0.0 to 1.0.
>If you increase the value, it will be easier for the user to swipe diagonally and if you decrease the value, user will need to make a rather straight finger movement to trigger a swipe.

properties.name: SwipeLeftSideColor
properties.description:
Specifies the background color of the action on the left side.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Designer*

properties.name: SwipeRightSideColor
properties.description:
Specifies the background color of the action on the right side.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Designer*

properties.name: SwipeLeftRevealColor
properties.description:
Specifies the color of the wave that indicates that the action on the left side is considered to be launched.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Designer*

properties.name: SwipeRightRevealColor
properties.description:
Specifies the color of the wave that indicates that the action on the right side is considered to be launched.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Designer*

properties.name: SwipeLeftSideIcon
properties.description:
Specifies the image file name that the RecyclerView will display in the action on the left side.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Designer, Blocks*
**Info:**
>The file must be located in the assets of the project. Only the name plus the extension should be entered.
>If the image is too large it will be resized.

properties.name: SwipeRightSideIcon
properties.description:
Specifies the image file name that the RecyclerView will display in the action on the right side.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Designer, Blocks*

properties.name: Visible
properties.description:
Specifies RecyclerView visibility.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Designer, Blocks*

properties.name: FixedSize
properties.description:
Specifies whether the RecyclerView will have a fixed size.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Designer, Blocks*
**Info:**
>If enabled, the size of the RecyclerView does not depend on its children. This means that it does not have to be constantly resized, thus preventing performance variations.

properties.name: BackgroundColor
properties.description:
Sets the background color of the RecyclerView.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Designer, Blocks*

properties.name: BackgroundAsset
properties.description:
Sets the background image of the RecyclerView.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Designer, Blocks*
**Info:**
>The file must be located in the assets of the project. Only the name plus the extension should be entered.

properties.name: Width
properties.description:
Sets the width of the RecyclerView.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Designer, Blocks*
**Info:**
>Allowed values are Automatic and FillParent
>To specify a different size, change it in the component where the RecyclerView will be created.

properties.name: Height
properties.description:
Sets the height of the RecyclerView.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Designer, Blocks*
**Info:**
>Allowed values are Automatic and FillParent
>To specify a different size, change it in the component where the RecyclerView will be created.

extensions.shortDescription: Based on the Android RecyclerView widget. This extension adds many functionalities of the RecyclerView for Kodular.

extensions.name: ZStack
extensions.description: It allows to model a new stack widget model. Based on the Android RelativeLayout widget.

methods.name: New
methods.description: Adds a new ZStack model to the model layout of the RecyclerView which is synced.

methods.name: BuildProps
methods.description: Returns a new property set containing the previously defined properties.

methods.name: SetHorizontalGravity
methods.description: This method changes the horizontal gravity of the widget.

methods.name: SetVerticalGravity
methods.description: This method changes the vertical gravity of the widget.

properties.name: HorizontalGravity
properties.description:
Specifies the horizontal gravity of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: VerticalGravity
properties.description:
SSpecifies the vertical gravity of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Background
properties.description:
Specifies the background of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Elevation
properties.description:
Specifies the elevation of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*
**Info:**
>The widget displays a shadow according to its elevation.
>In order for the shadow to be displayed, the widget must have a non-transparent background.

properties.name: LayoutMetrics
properties.description:
Specifies the set of properties that the parent of the widget will take to create the widget's measures.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: PaddingLeft
properties.description:
Specifies the space between the left edge and the content of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: PaddingRight
properties.description:
Specifies the space between the right edge and the content of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: PaddingTop
properties.description:
Specifies the space between the top edge and the content of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: PaddingBottom
properties.description:
Specifies the space between the bottom edge and the content of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Padding
properties.description:
Specifies the space between the edges and the content of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Enabled
properties.description:
Specifies whether the widget is enabled.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Visible
properties.description:
Specifies whether the widget is visible (true) or invisible (false).
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*
**Info:**
>Being invisible, it does not occupy any space.

properties.name: Clickable
properties.description:
Specifies whether the widget can be clicked.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: LongClickable
properties.description:
Specifies if the widget can be long clicked.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Alpha
properties.description:
Specifies the opacity of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*
**Info:**
>Range from 0.0 (0% visible) to 1.0 (100% visible)

properties.name: GravityStart
properties.description:
Linear Gravity.
**Block Types:** *Read*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: GravityEnd
properties.description:
Linear Gravity.
**Block Types:** *Read*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: GravityCenter
properties.description:
Linear Gravity.
**Block Types:** *Read*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

extensions.shortDescription: It allows to model a new stack widget model. Based on the Android RelativeLayout widget.

extensions.name: ZView
extensions.description: It allows to model a new widget model. The methods in this component can be applied in any widget.

methods.name: New
methods.description: Adds a new ZView model to the model layout of the RecyclerView which is synced.

methods.name: BuildProps
methods.description: Returns a new property set containing the previously defined properties.

methods.name: DefaultProps
methods.description: Returns an empty property set.

methods.name: SetElevation
methods.description: Changes the elevation of the widget.

methods.name: SetPaddingLeft
methods.description: This method changes the left padding of the widget.

methods.name: SetPaddingTop
methods.description: This method changes the top padding of the widget.

methods.name: SetPaddingRight
methods.description: This method changes the right padding of the widget.

methods.name: SetPaddingBottom
methods.description: This method changes the bottom padding of the widget.

methods.name: SetPadding
methods.description: This method changes the padding of the widget.

methods.name: SetEnabled
methods.description: This method sets the widget as enabled or disabled.

methods.name: SetVisible
methods.description: This method changes the visibility of the widget.

methods.name: SetClickable
methods.description: This method changes if the widget responds to click events.

methods.name: SetLongClickable
methods.description: This method changes if the widget responds to long click events.

methods.name: SetAlpha
methods.description: This method changes the opacity of the widget.
